Description: A primary focus in oncology research is the study of circulating tumour DNA (ctDNA) and circulating tumour cells (CTCs) as key components of liquid biopsies. The Genesis Cell Isolation System using Celselect SlidesTM for comprehensive CTC enrichment or enumeration and the QX600 ddPCR system for analysis of circulating nucleic acids are a step change in cellular and molecular analysis of liquid biopsies. With unbiased size selection of CTCs and 6-color multiplexing capabilities these platforms provide a comprehensive workflow capability for enumerating CTCs, quantifying ctDNA, or combining CTC enrichment together with analysis of captured CTCs at the molecular or cellular level.
SearchResultBody: ESP07A. A Combined Workflow for Molecular and Cellular Analysis of Liquid Biopsies
Title: A Combined Workflow for Molecular and Cellular Analysis of Liquid Biopsies
